org.fax4j.spi
Interface FaxJobMonitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFaxJobMonitor, FaxJobMonitorImpl
public interface FaxJobMonitor

This interface defines the fax job monitor capabilities.

Since:
0.40.2
Version:
1.01
Author:
Sagie Gur-Ari

Method Summary
 void initialize(Map<String,String> configuration, Logger logger)
          This function initializes the fax job monitor.
This method is called by the FaxClientSpiFactory.
 void monitorFaxJob(FaxClientSpi faxClientSpi, FaxJob faxJob)
          This function starts monitoring the requested fax job.
 void stopMonitoringAllFaxJobs(FaxClientSpi faxClientSpi)
          This function will stop the monitoring of all fax jobs registered by the provided fax client SPI.
Other fax jobs registered by other SPIs will keep on being monitored.
 

Method Detail

initialize

void initialize(Map<String,String> configuration,
                Logger logger)
This function initializes the fax job monitor.
This method is called by the FaxClientSpiFactory.

Parameters:
configuration - The fax job monitor configuration
logger - The internal logger

monitorFaxJob

void monitorFaxJob(FaxClientSpi faxClientSpi,
                   FaxJob faxJob)
This function starts monitoring the requested fax job.

Parameters:
faxClientSpi - The fax client SPI
faxJob - The fax job to monitor

stopMonitoringAllFaxJobs

void stopMonitoringAllFaxJobs(FaxClientSpi faxClientSpi)
This function will stop the monitoring of all fax jobs registered by the provided fax client SPI.
Other fax jobs registered by other SPIs will keep on being monitored.

Parameters:
faxClientSpi - The fax client SPI
